mapper.select: SELECT stuNo, name, rpad(substr(id,1, length(id)-3),length(id),'*') as id, grade, SUBSTR(JUMIN, 1, 6)||'-'||RPAD(SUBSTR(JUMIN,7,1),7,'*') as JUMIN FROM stu

select stuno, s.name, d1.dname as dept1, d.dname as dept2, p.name as prof from stu s inner join department d on s.deptno1 = d.deptno inner join department d1 on d.part = d1.deptno inner join professor p on s.profno = p.profno where stuno = #{stuNo}
